title: Pepsi Raw semi-stencil futuristic sans
content:
Can anyone ID the font used for "RAW"?

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [pepsiraw.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010215009/http:/typophile.com/files/pepsiraw.jpg) | 60.87 KB |
author: vwcruisn

comments.content: Most likely custom, but [FF Oxide](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010215009/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_oxide_stencil_ot_bold/) is a great alternative.
